Name: Gin Salad Dry Martini
Ingredients: 1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of 3 skewered chilled Fragata Green Olives and 2 cocktail onions.
Garnish with skewered olives and onions.
Review: A Gin Salad is made like a regular Dry Martini but with three olives and two cocktail onions as garnish. They should be pushed onto the stick in the following order: olive-onion-olive-onion-olive.
History: See: History of the Martini and its evolution .
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Salad Dry Martini contains 183 calories
